1.text: Put a large pan on the stove and turn it to medium heat.

2.text: Grease the warm pan with butter.

4.text: Pour the eggs into the pan.

5.text: Add 2 slices of bread to the pan, coating them in the eggs.

6.text: Flip the eggs and bread when the eggs are hard enough.

7.text: Sprinkle shredded cheese on top of the bread.

8.text: Fold the edges of the eggs onto the slices of bread.

9.text: Flip one slice of bread on top of the other to make a sandwich.

10.text: Put the sandwich on a plate and cut it in half to eat.
